item.title: Week 1: Network Analysis Pipeline Setup
item.dc:creator: Linda K. Sg.
item.description:
This Week’s Focus

Started building the analysis pipeline for immune cell network analysis…

Methods Implemented

  • Louvain clustering for community detection
  • NetworkX for graph construction
  • Scanpy preprocessing workflow

Code

import scanpy as sc
import networkx as nx

# Pipeline setup
...

Challenges

Memory issues with large adjacency matrices → switched to sparse representation.

Next Steps

  • Validate clustering on test dataset
  • Implement visualization
  • Write up methods section

Tags: Working on immune network topology project, implementing graph analysis methods, debugging memory issues.
